source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: How to Draw Comic Style Faces in Sketchbook Pro
items.headline: Learn to Draw a Male and Female Face from Start to Finish
objectives_summary: Draw their comic book style faces.
Draw facial features properly.
Use Sketchbook Pro more effectively.

items.title: Drawing Fundamentals 2: Perspective Basics for 3D Sketching
items.headline: Learn How to Draw from Your Imagination Using These Simple Illustration Principles and Techniques!
objectives_summary: Understanding the basic elements of perspective & how they work together to create illusion of 3D forms
How to use one & two-point perspective to draw three dimensional objects from your imagination
How to draw the boxes, cylinders, and spheres & combine them to create any objects you want

items.title: Jewelry Making: Decorative Wire Wrapping 1 - Herringbone
items.headline: Mastering the Herringbone Wrap: Take your wire wrapping to the next level with this elegant jewelry making technique!
objectives_summary: Take your wire wrapped jewelry to the next level with this stunning technique!
Make beautiful inspired jewelry designs and components using the herringbone wrap
Create several variations on the herringbone pattern using wire and beads

items.title: How To Draw Animals For Beginners - Get AMAZING Results
items.headline: You'll Learn How to Draw 5 Stunning Pictures. Follow Colin Step by Step and Draw a Puppy, Kitten, Owl, Wolf and Penguin
objectives_summary: Use Pastel Pencil Techniques to draw realistic Animal Paintings
Apply the light to dark rule when layering pastel tones
Draw a variety of domestic and wild animals

items.title: Paint Realistic Watercolour and Botanicals - LOTUS

visible_instructors.title: Heidi Willis
visible_instructors.job_title: Renowned Watercolor Artist and Art Tutor
visible_instructors.name: Heidi

items.headline: Taking our painting practice into a new subject concretes our learning to this point, and develops new skills beyond
objectives_summary: At the end of this course, you will have improved your knowledge and skills in watercolour painting
At the end of this course, you will have improved your knowledge and skills in botanical illustration
At the end of this course, you will have improved your knowledge and the techniques needed to create paintings of the LOTUS as a subject

items.title: Abstract Painting - Going Big
items.headline: Learn How to Stretch and Paint Large Acrylic Abstract Paintings Economically
objectives_summary: Create your Large Abstract Paintings on a budget
Make your own stretcher bars
Stretch a large canvas

items.title: Sewing Patterns 101: Learn to Read Sewing Patterns

visible_instructors.title: Ariana Bauer
visible_instructors.job_title: Sewing Teacher, Pattern Maker, and Designer
visible_instructors.name: Ariana

items.headline: Learn how to read any kinds of sewing pattern - from printed patterns to PDF patterns and even vintage patterns.
objectives_summary: Read and understand traditional printed sewing patterns.
Read and understand PDF sewing patterns.
Read and understand vintage and antique sewing patterns.

items.title: Shading Masters: The Ultimate Drawing Course for Artists
items.headline: Learn the simplest methods for achieving mind-blowing realistic drawings fast using a simple 4 step process!
objectives_summary: Use the 3 step process to shade anything effectively and quickly.
Shade faces and other textures realistically.
Know exactly what tools to buy and why

items.title: Alcohol Ink on Yupo Easy Steps Paint a Lilac and Sunflower
items.headline: Learn to Paint more detailed and less abstract with Alcohol Inks. Create two paintings on Yupo Paper.
objectives_summary: Understand  how inks work and how to use them to create a Lilac painting.
Learn about Alcohol Ink and Yupo paper.
How to professionally frame your painting.

items.title: How to Do Magic Tricks & Easy Card Tricks for Beginners

visible_instructors.title: Matt McGurk
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Magician. Magic Coach. British Magical Champion
visible_instructors.name: Matt

items.headline: The Complete Magic Course for Beginners. Learn How to do Magic Tricks & Easy Card Tricks. Go from 0 To Hero in 7 days
objectives_summary: A Complete Beginners Guide to Magic
First Class Training from a British Champion Magician
Easy Card Tricks that you can master in minutes

items.title: watercolor fantasy flowers
items.headline: learn a fun new style
objectives_summary: Learn how to create beautifully colored abstract watercolor flowers

items.title: Super Woodburning & Pyrography Techniques
items.headline: An easy and fun way to be creative using just one amazing tool - the woodburning pen!
objectives_summary: Learn, through step-by-step video demonstrations, how to correctly use the wood-burning tool and its various burning points to develop the technique in creating a high-quality wood-burned product.
Students will develop confidence and a keen understanding of the best burning points and techniques used to create awesome handmade pyrography art.
Develop a mastery and love of the wonderful Art of Pyrography, allowing the student to develop a hobby, or a niche as a means to generate income.

items.title: Start & Run An Art Teaching Business

visible_instructors.title: Rod Moore
visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor, Artist & Art Teacher
visible_instructors.name: Rod

items.headline: Teach Art Classes & Art Workshops - Starting An Art Teaching Business & Earn An Income From Your Artwork
objectives_summary: You Will Learn If Starting An Art Teaching Business Is A Good Idea For You or Not
The Different Types Of Classes You Can Run
How To Get Started In The Art Teaching Business

items.title: Art School for Beginners: Draw & Paint 10 Cool Animals
items.headline: Young Artists Will Learn How to Draw and Watercolor Paint 10 Animals Step-By-Step. Designed for Beginners of All Ages.
objectives_summary: Create 10 Magnificent Watercolor Paintings.
Participate in an activity that cultivates critical thinking skills, develops hand-eye coordination, and encourages self-expression.
Apply the knowledge gained in this course to create unique masterpieces.

items.title: Beginners guide to drawing cartoon characters in Procreate
items.headline: Learn the basics of drawing cartoons on your iPad with your Apple Pencil. Step-by-step lessons for Procreate
objectives_summary: You will be able to create your own high quality art elements
Download custom drawing brushes specifically tweaked to draw cartoons

items.title: Byzantine Iconography Series 1: Drawing the Face
items.headline: Laying the Foundations for Byzantine Iconography
objectives_summary: By the end of the course students will have learned the importance of line and rhythm in the Byzantine icon and will be able to draw the face in several poses.
Draw the face in the frontal pose
Draw the face in the dynamic frontal pose on curved axes
